INPUTSTREAM ANALYSER

When the HTTPRequested xml File is get from the Client to Server Side, The InputStream Analyser Application is start to run and Apply the Conditions to get the Operated Data.

The InputStream Analyser is Used to Read and write the XML File and apply some Conditions to get the Particular Output.The Output are Saved in the *.tsv File.

The Conditions are

1. The Condition is TRUE if the given xml Element didn't have the file and InputStream Element.
2. The Condition is TRUE if the given xml Element's method value is GET and the Operation type is WRITE.
3. The Condition is TRUE if the given xml Element's method value is POST and the Operation type is READ or WRITE or UPDATE.
4. The Condition is TRUE if the given xml Element's method value is PUT and the Operation type is READ or WRITE or UPDATE.
5. The Condition is TRUE if the given xml Element's method value is DELETE and the Operation type is READ or WRITE or UPDATE.

Packages
Package
Description
XML_Learn
It is the Common Package that had the DOM_Parser and File_Handling Package.
XML_Learn.DOM_Parser
The XML_Learn.DOM_Parser Package Contains the DOM_Reader class.
XML_Learn.File_Handling
The XML_Learn.File_Handling Contains the File_Reader and File_Writer Class.
